about.title: About Us
about.description: Contact Manager is a lightweight and secure web application designed for handling contact submissions. Originally developed as a learning project with a focus on clean backend architecture, the app has grown into a reusable boilerplate for small-scale forms with admin access.
about.techStack: This project is built using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and EJS, with simplicity, transparency, and developer-friendliness in mind.
about.openSource: Feel free to use or contribute – this project is open-source and made with ❤️ by developers who care about clean, maintainable code.
about.credits: Developed by Miłosz G. and ChatGPT as part of a hands-on learning & fullstack growth journey.
